overview:
Thomas has a strong background in commercial law with an emphasis on finance and ICT companies. Thomas joined the team in May 2003 and was previously employed by Danske Life Science as senior associate in charge of legal affairs and operational procedures. Since 2000 he has as partner in the law firm Elvang & Partners specialised in ICT companies and has experience within financing and software licensing. Before joining Elvang & Partners, Thomas was employed at KromannReumert, where he obtained experience in transactions.

Thomas is a Master of Law from the University of Copenhagen and an LL.M from the University of Cambridge.
